outputs.output_descr: The project has 3 main objectives. Firstly it is aimed at strengthening the regional practice architecture in Eastern and Southern Africa. The primary activity in this regard will be the enhancing the effectiveness of the Regional Governance Practice and the establishment and maintenance of a Regional Governance Community of Practice for Eastern and Southern Africa.  Secondly, it is aimed at supporting an assessment of innovative governance programming funded through the DGTTF, since its inception, with the objective of drawing key lessons and experiences in democratic governance programming at the national levels within the sub-region. Thirdly, the project has the objective of creating a rapid and effective response mechanism to country office demand.

project_descr: STRENGTHENING THE REGIONAL DEMOCRATIC GOVERNANCE PRACTICE ARCHITECTURE
